page.title: 14RECREATION IN EPSOM
page.content: {In Epsom there are many parks and {clubs including the following: {Ebbisham Sports Club.}There are 645 members who play tennis, squash and badminton, which have 3 courts each. The club is open all day, 7 days a week and celebrates its 50th anniversary in 1987. {Epsom Court Bowling Club}is in the Court recreation ground and celebrated its 50th anniversary in 1985. There are 60 members and 6 bowling rinks. {Epsom Baths}has a large swimming pool, sauna, turkish baths, and a solarium. The baths are open 7 days a week and there is also a cafeteria. {Epsom Court Recreation Ground}is run by the council, and contains 6 tennis courts - 2 grass, 4 clay - pitches for cricket, rugby, and football, a pavillion and children's playground.
